about.name: Daniel Merino Cano
about.title: Software Engineer
about.description: I'm a Software Engineer at Thales Alenia Space, passionate about building robust, scalable full-stack solutions for satellite data processing. I specialize in Angular, TypeScript, HTML/CSS on the front end and Java Spring Boot on the back end, with CI/CD pipelines in GitLab, container orchestration via Kubernetes and Docker, and automation/AI integration using Python. I’m driven by adaptability, critical thinking, and a disciplined, open-minded approach to cybersecurity and system hardening, ensuring every release is resilient and secure. Continuously learning and collaborating across disciplines, I bridge the gap between technology, business needs, and real-world applications.
